songs.title: Shoot First, Die Later
songs.lyrics:
[Hook]

I turn your dick into soup

[Verse 1: ILL Bill]

[Verse 2: Lord Goat]
I spit decrepid, I'm a metal legend, you a bitch infection
I'm young Satan in the mirror, check for my reflection
I grow indoors, got the Porsche with graffiti walls
????? Imorted like Boston George
Rocky dentist, lots of shots got your face dripping
I'm not a rapper, just a killer who fillets his victims
Get that brown matza from Sri Lanka
We rock stars heavy metal killers move hot cars

[Samples]
[Hook]

[Verse 3: ILL Bill]
Just give me DeNiro
Don't be a hero
